## **Twitter Analysis Project**

# ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/%E2%9C%85-Complete-brightgreen)

> **Completed a sentiment analysis on Tweets about several topics, and a word correlation visualization.**

## Languages used:

> -   R
>
> -   SQL
>
> -   Markdown
>
>     -   R Markdown, GitHub Markdown

## Tools used:

> -   RStudio
>
> -   postgreSQL
>
> -   pgAdmin4
>
> -   GitHub
>
> -   Twitter Developer Account

## Packages used:

| `R` **Package** | **Use**                                 |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|
| `tidyverse`     | data manipulation, cleaning, etc.       |
| `tidytext`      | text data manipulation, cleaning, etc.  |
| `rtweet`        | communicate with Twitter API and R      |
| `RPostgres`     | communicate with postgreSQL database    |
| `DBI`           | communicate with databases, and use SQL |
| `Quarto`        | for reporting insights and methods      |
| `widyr`         | for pairwise correlation                |
